Name: PayerType
Title: Payer Type
Descriptino: Name changed on 2023-06-02 per JIRA https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-39982

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: BundleType
Title: BundleType
Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: ConditionCategoryCodes
Title: Condition Category Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition Categories.

Name: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
Title: Condition Clinical Status Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

Name: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity
Title: Condition/Diagnosis Severity
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading.

Name: ConditionStage
Title: Condition Stage
Descriptino: Example value set for stages of cancer and other conditions.

Name: ConditionStageType
Title: Condition Stage Type
Descriptino: Example value set for the type of stages of cancer and other conditions

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus
Title: ConditionVerificationStatus
Descriptino: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.

Name: CoverageClassCodes
Title: Coverage Class Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes Coverage Class codes.

Name: CoverageCopayTypeCodes
Title: Coverage Copay Type Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes sample Coverage Copayment Type codes.

Name: ExampleCoverageFinancialExceptionCodes
Title: Example Coverage Financial Exception Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes Example Coverage Financial Exception Codes.

Name: DiagnosisRole
Title: DiagnosisRole
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

Name: AdmitSource
Title: Admit source
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

Name: Diet
Title: Diet
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

Name: EncounterLocationStatus
Title: EncounterLocationStatus
Descriptino: The status of the location.

Name: ParticipantType
Title: Participant type
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

Name: EncounterReasonCodes
Title: Encounter Reason Codes
Descriptino: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

Name: SpecialArrangements
Title: Special arrangements
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

Name: SpecialCourtesy
Title: Special courtesy
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

Name: EncounterStatus
Title: EncounterStatus
Descriptino: Current state of the encounter.

Name: FinancialResourceStatusCodes
Title: Financial Resource Status Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes Status codes.

Name: HTTPVerb
Title: HTTPVerb
Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LocationType
Title: Location type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

Name: ManifestationAndSymptomCodes
Title: Manifestation and Symptom Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Manifestation and Symptom codes.

Name: MessageEvent
Title: MessageEvent
Descriptino: One of the message events defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: ExampleMessageReasonCodes
Title: Example Message Reason Codes
Descriptino: Example Message Reasons. These are the set of codes that might be used an updating an encounter using admin-update.

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: ResponseType
Title: ResponseType
Descriptino: The kind of response to a message.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: USCoreConditionCodes
Title: US Core Condition Codes
Descriptino: This describes the problem. Diagnosis/Problem List is broadly defined as a series of brief statements that catalog a patient's medical, nursing, dental, social, preventative and psychiatric events and issues that are relevant to that patient's healthcare (e.g., signs, symptoms, and defined conditions). ICD-10 is appropriate for Diagnosis information, and ICD-9 for historical information.

Name: USCoreDischargeDisposition
Title: US Core Discharge Disposition
Descriptino: [National Uniform Billing Committee](http://www.nubc.org/), manual UB-04, UB form locator 17.

Name: USCoreEncounterType
Title: US Core Encounter Type
Descriptino: The type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided. This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT decending from the concept 308335008 (Patient encounter procedure (procedure)) and codes from the Current Procedure and Terminology (CPT) found in the following CPT sections: - 99201-99499 E/M - 99500-99600 home health (mainly nonphysician, such as newborn care in home) - 99605-99607 medication management - 98966-98968 non physician telephone services (subscription to AMA Required)

Name: NotificationAdmitEventValueSet
Title: Da Vinci Notification Admit Event ValueSet
Descriptino: Concepts describing Da Vinci Unsolicited Admit Notification notification events.

Name: NotificationDischargeEventValueSet
Title: Da Vinci Notification Discharge Event ValueSet
Descriptino: Concepts describing Da Vinci Unsolicited Notification discharge notification events.

Name: NotificationEventValueSet
Title: Da Vinci Notification Event ValueSet
Descriptino: Concepts describing the purpose of the Da Vinci Unsolicited Notification.

Name: NotificationTransferEventValueSet
Title: Da Vinci Notification Transfer Event ValueSet
Descriptino: Concepts describing Da Vinci Unsolicited Notification transfer notification events.

Name: HRexCoverageRelationship
Title: HRex Coverage Relationship ValueSet
Descriptino: Adds 'unknown' to the list of standard coverage relationship types

Name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
Title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
Descriptino: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

Name: ActEncounterCode
Title: ActEncounterCode
Descriptino: Domain provides codes that qualify the ActEncounterClass (ENC)

Name: ActPriority
Title: ActPriority
Descriptino: A code or set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency,) specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.    *Discussion:* This attribute is used in orders to indicate the ordered priority, and in event documentation it indicates the actual priority used to perform the act. In definition mood it indicates the available priorities.
